item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "After silence, that which comes nearest to expressing the inexpressible is music." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "I like being myself. Myself and nasty." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by T.H. White
item.description: "The best thing for being sad," replied Merlin, beginning to puff and blow, "is to learn something. That's the only thing that never fails. You may grow old and trembling in your anatomies, you may lie awake at night listening to the disorder of your veins, you may miss your only love, you may see the world about you devastated by evil lunatics, or know your honour trampled in the sewers of baser minds. There is only one thing for it then — to learn. Learn why the world wags and what wags it. That is the only thing which the mind can never exhaust, never alienate, never be tortured by, never fear or distrust, and never dream of regretting. Learning is the only thing for you. Look what a lot of things there are to learn." -- T.H. White

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by T.H. White
item.description: "The bravest people are the ones who don’t mind looking like cowards." -- T.H. White

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by T.H. White
item.description: "It is a pity that there are no big creatures to prey on humanity. If there were enough dragons and rocs, perhaps mankind would turn its might against them. Unfortunately man is preyed upon by microbes, which are too small to be appreciated." -- T.H. White

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Timothy Zahn
item.description: "Without trust, there can be no genuine peace. Neither in politics, nor in the quiet individuality of the heart and spirit." -- Timothy Zahn

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Timothy Zahn
item.description:
"Multiple species, with multiple viewpoints and racial philosophies, simply cannot hold power together for long. The dominant voice must certainly be wise enough to adopt ideas and methods from its allies and member peoples. But there must <i>be</i> a dominant voice, or there is only chaos. In this part of the galaxy, that voice is the Empire."
-Thrawn" -- Timothy Zahn

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Timothy Zahn
item.description: "If you don't want to be noticed, you don't use a Star Destroyer." -- Timothy Zahn

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Jospeh Conrad
item.description: "I let him run on, this papier-maché Mephistopheles, and it seemed to me that if I tried I could poke my forefinger through him, and would find nothing inside but a little loose dirt, maybe." -- Jospeh Conrad

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Erich Fromm
item.description: "One cannot be deeply responsive to the world without being saddened very often." -- Erich Fromm

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Erich Fromm
item.description: "Nationalism is our form of incest, is our idolatry, is our insanity. 'Patriotism' is its cult... Just as love for one individual which excludes the love for others is not love, love for one's country which is not part of one's love for humanity is not love, but idolatrous worship." -- Erich Fromm

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Lilith Saintcrow
item.description: "I guess since the groin is the center of a guy's world, he rarely guesses it isn't the center of yours." -- Lilith Saintcrow

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Lilith Saintcrow
item.description: "God and Hell both damn it," -- Lilith Saintcrow

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "Absolute power does not corrupt absolutely, absolute power attracts the corruptible." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "A process cannot be understood by stopping it. Understanding must move with the flow of the process, must join it and flow with it." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "What do you despise? By this are you truly known." -- Frank Herbert
